required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Evaluation of Dai Dai Flower on Body Weight
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy Evaluation of Dai Dai Flower on Body Weight

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the Dai Dai flower extract on body weight control

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline body weight at 8 weeks
primary_outcome.description: The body weight (kg) was assessed by InBody.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline BMI at 8 weeks
primary_outcome.description: The BMI was assessed by InBody.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of body fat mass
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline body fat mass at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: The body fat mass (kg) was assessed by InBody.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of visceral fat mass
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline visceral fat mass at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: The visceral fat mass (kg) was assessed by InBody.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline waist-hip ratio at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: The waist-hip ratio was assessed by measuring tape.

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of basal metabolic rate
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline basal metabolic rate at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: The basal metabolic rate was assessed by InBody.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline AST at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of aspartate transaminase (AST)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline ALT at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of alanine aminotransferase (ALT)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline creatinine at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of creatinine

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline BUN at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of blood urea nitrogen (BUN)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline fasting glycemia at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of fasting glycemia

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline total cholesterol at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of total cholesterol

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline triglyceride at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of triglyceride

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline HDL-cholesterol at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of HDL-cholesterol

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline LDL-cholesterol at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of LDL-cholesterol

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline insulin at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of insulin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline adiponectin at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of adiponectin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline leptin at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of leptin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline IFN-γ at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of IFN-γ

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline IL-2 at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of IL-2

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from Baseline IL-1beta at 8 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of IL-1beta

intervention.description: consume 1 bottle (50 mL) per day for 8 weeks
consume 1 bottle (50 mL) per day for 8 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male or female aged between 20 and 60 years old
- Body mass index (BMI) ≥ 24 (kg/m^2) or body fat mass ≥ 25%
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or breastfeeding woman
- Implementation in weight loss programs, consumption drugs or supplements for weight control before 3 months of this study
- Participate weight control or fat loss human studies before 3 months of this study
- History of cardiovascular disease, liver disease, kidney disease, endocrine disease, or other major organic diseases (according to subjects reporting).
- Person who has received major surgery or bariatric surgery (according to medical history).
- Person who has received constant drug use.
- People with mental illness
